mapper.select: SELECT pay.CPAY_C CPAY_C, pay.CPAY_N CPAY_N, pay.CBILL_C CBILL_C, ROUND(SUM(pay.nPayAmt) ,2) payTypeAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_bill_pay pay WHERE pay.CBILL_C = #{CBILL_C} GROUP BY pay.CPAY_C, pay.CPAY_N, pay.CBILL_C

SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') businessDate, a.cBranch_C shopC, a.CBRANCH_N shopName, b.cPay_C payCode, b.cPay_N payName, SUM(b.nPayAmt) payAmt FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill a, ${com}.d_t_bill_pay b WHERE a.cBill_C = b.cBill_C AND date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') IN ( SELECT date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill d WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d') ) GROUP BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.cBranch_C, a.CBRANCH_N, b.cPay_C, b.cPay_N ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d'), a.cBranch_C

select cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopName, sum(nPayAmt) payAmt from ${com}.d_t_food_bill where DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} and cBranch_C = #{shopC} group by cBranch_C, cBranch_N order by cBranch_C

select a.cBranch_C shopC, b.cPay_C payCode,b.cPay_N payName, sum(b.nPayAmt) payAmt from ${com}.d_t_food_bill a, ${com}.d_t_bill_pay b where a.cBill_C = b.cBill_C and a.DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND a.DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} group by a.cBranch_C,b.cPay_C, b.cPay_N

select cBranch_C shopC, cBranch_N shopName, sum(nPayAmt) payAmt from ${com}.d_t_food_bill a where a.DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND a.DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} group by cBranch_C, cBranch_N order by cBranch_C

select a.cBranch_C, b.cPay_C,b.cPay_N, sum(b.nPayAmt) payAmt from ${com}.d_t_food_bill a, ${com}.d_t_bill_pay b where a.cBill_C = b.cBill_C and a.DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND a.DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} group by a.cBranch_C,b.cPay_C, b.cPay_N
SELECT count(DISTINCT date_format(DBUSINESS, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ) FROM ${com}.d_t_food_bill b WHERE DBUSINESS >= #{startTime} AND DBUSINESS <= #{endTime} ORDER BY date_format(DBUSINESS, '%Y-%m-%d')
